title: Looking for friendly players.
body:
Hello,
Looking to play with friendly, relaxed people, who don't take the game incredibly seriously, but are just want to play and have a laugh. Putting big emphasis on friendly, the last post people seemed to miss the friendly part. For the sake of narrowing down the amount of twats, please don't be under 17 or so.
Feel free to add me in game on 'Daghoon'.
Thanks

replies.body:
Hey man im keen as to find some people to jam with casually.
Will add.
Mercilus

I'm almost 18 and was B1 before I stopped playing ranked like over a year ago. Pretty laid back here but sometimes I can be negative about the game. Passive aggressive but otherwise I'm chill and I don't insult my teammates, usually just myself

I usually only have time to play a couple of games at night (8-12 sort of timeframe and not every night....because two jobs are not fun ;-;), but I've been looking around for a group or whatever who just want to have fun.
So yeah, anybody who's interested, add me too! :D
- Xenarith

Im plat 4 but im only 15.
Is that ok?
I wanna chill cuz im getting bored

I'd be keen, was just about to make my own post on this haha, seems most of the community is either toxic or too serious in the normal queues so it's rare to find anyone to actually have fun with, anyone feel free to add me :) - SwishyD
~~I'm an older player but in lower tiers! Would love to make friends if you don't mind my tiers.~~ It is also fine with me since your are not interested!
Hit me up I'm in for it
